user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me an email at sarah@cognitivegrowth.org summarizing our latest discussion on therapy methods and remind him to consult his Notion for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Would you mind sending me an email at sarah@cognitivegrowth.org with a brief summary of our most recent discussion on contemporary therapy methods? When you prepare the summary, please remember to consult your Notion workspace for any pertinent notes or details.

Thanks so much, and talk to you soon!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:

I hope you’re doing well. Would you mind sending me an email at sarah@cognitivegrowth.org with a brief summary of our most recent discussion on contemporary therapy methods? When you prepare the summary, please remember to consult your Notion workspace for any pertinent notes or details.

Thanks so much, and talk to you soon!

Best,
Sarah
